nodes.text: Decipher, Inc. were the license holders and publishers of the Star Wars Customizable Card Game between 1995 and 2001.

Decipher sought to rejuvenate the Star Wars Customizable Card Game mechanics after losing the license in 2001, creating the nonlicensed WARS Trading Card Game in 2004. Consumer apathy resulted in the game being placed on indefinite hiatus after less than a year in production, and officially cancelled a few months later.[source?]
Decipher has been around since the 1980s through various board games. The motto for Decipher has been: "Decipher: The Art of Great Games."
